description: The COVERAGE_BENEFITS table contains coverage-level benefit information for the encounter or estimate to which this benefit record is attached.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the benefit record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CVG_ID
columns.description: Each line in this related group contains benefit information for a coverage that is or was in use for this visit.

columns.name: CHECKED_BY_USER_ID
columns.description: The user by whom the coverage benefits were checked.

columns.name: CHECKED_ON_DT
columns.description: The date when the coverage benefits were checked.

columns.name: CHECKED_WITH_C_NAME
columns.description:
The organization or group with whom the benefits for this coverage were checked.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: CHECKED_WITH_AGY_ID
columns.description: The agency with whom the benefits for this coverage were checked.

columns.name: CHECKED_WITH_AGY_ID_AGENCY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the agency.

columns.name: CHECKD_WITH_CONTACT
columns.description: The contact with whom the benefits for this coverage were checked.

columns.name: CHECKED_WITH_PHONE
columns.description: The phone number with which the benefits for this coverage were checked.

columns.name: CHECKED_WITH_FAX
columns.description: The fax number with which the benefits for this coverage were checked.

columns.name: CVG_BEN_VERIF_ID
columns.description: The verification record for visit-specific coverage benefits.

columns.name: EVALUATION_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The current evaluated status of the coverage benefits for this coverage (covered, not covered, in progress, etc.).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Covered


Not Covered

columns.name: EXPECTED_COLL_AMT
columns.description: The amount expected to be collected from the patient for this coverage.

columns.name: COPAY_AMOUNT
columns.description: The copay for this coverage.

columns.name: DEDUCTIBLE_AMOUNT
columns.description: Deductible for this coverage.

columns.name: DEDUCTIBLE_MET_AMT
columns.description: The amount of the deductible for this coverage that has already been paid.

columns.name: DEDUCT_REMAIN_AMT
columns.description: The amount of the deductible for this coverage that has yet to be paid.

columns.name: COINS_PERCENT
columns.description: The coinsurance percentage for this coverage.

columns.name: COINS_AMOUNT
columns.description: The coinsurance amount for this coverage.

columns.name: OUT_OF_POCKET_MAX
columns.description: The maximum out-of-pocket payment for this coverage.

columns.name: OUT_OF_PCKT_REMAIN
columns.description: The remaining out-of-pocket payment for this coverage.

columns.name: OUT_OF_PCKET_MET_YN
columns.description:
Has the out-of-pocket cost been met for this coverage.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: OOP_INCL_DEDUCT_YN
columns.description:
Does the out-of-pocket payment include the deductible cost?


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: OUT_OF_PCKET_MET_YN

columns.name: COVERED_DAYS
columns.description: Track covered days -- this is normally used for Medicare.

columns.name: NON_COVERED_DAYS
columns.description: The non-covered days  - this is normally used for Medicare

columns.name: COINS_DAYS
columns.description: Track the coinsurance days -- this is normally used for Medicare

columns.name: LTR_DAYS
columns.description: Track the lifetime reserve days -- this is usually used for Medicare.

columns.name: ANNUAL_BEN_MAX_AMT
columns.description: The maximum annual benefits for this coverage.

columns.name: ANNUAL_BEN_REMAIN
columns.description: The annual benefits remaining for this coverage.

columns.name: LIFETIME_BEN_MAX
columns.description: The maximum lifetime benefits for this coverage.

columns.name: LIFETIME_BEN_REMAIN
columns.description: The lifetime benefits remaining for this coverage.

columns.name: SPEND_DOWN_AMT
columns.description: The spend down amount for this coverage during the defined interval.

columns.name: SPEND_DOWN_REMAIN
columns.description: The spend down amount remaining for this coverage during the specified interval.

columns.name: SPEND_DOWN_INTRVL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The interval at which the spend down amount will reset.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


One Week


One Month


Three Months


Six Months


One Year

columns.name: PREEXISTING_COND_YN
columns.description:
Do any pre-existing conditions apply for this coverage?


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: OUT_OF_PCKET_MET_YN

columns.name: PREEXIST_COND_DESC
columns.description: The description of any pre-existing conditions that apply for this coverage.

columns.name: IN_NETWORK_YN
columns.description:
Is in-network care required for this coverage and service type?


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: OUT_OF_PCKET_MET_YN

columns.name: PREFERRED_NETWORK
columns.description: The preferred network, if any, for this coverage.

columns.name: TRACKINC_CODE
columns.description: The tracking code for payor communication about this coverage.

columns.name: ESTIMATE_NEEDED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether an estimate should be collected for this encounter/coverage.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: OUT_OF_PCKET_MET_YN

columns.name: CVG_UPDATE_DTTM
columns.description: This item contains the last instant in which data for this line's coverage was updated.

columns.name: CVG_UPDATE_USER_ID
columns.description: This item contains the ID of the user who last updated the data for this line's coverage.

columns.name: CVG_UPDATE_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item contains the source that made the last update to this line's coverage.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Manual Update


Eligibility Query


Automatic copy from canceled encounter


Automatic copy from related encounter


Automatic copy from current encounter


Previous Eligibility Query


Automatic population from benefits engine


Reference BEN for Estimates


Automatic copy from related estimate

columns.name: COST_SHARE_ACCT_BAL
columns.description: This item stores the HRA account balance for the HRA account associated with the managed care coverage. It is a coverage specific item.

columns.name: ACTIVELY_ENROLLED_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates if the patient is actively enrolled in HRA.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: OUT_OF_PCKET_MET_YN

columns.name: DAILY_COPAY_AMOUNT
columns.description: The amount that is multiplied by the length of stay to calculate the total inpatient copay for this coverage. This is different from the visit copay amount.

columns.name: MAX_DAILY_COPAY
columns.description: The maximum total amount the patient may be charged in daily copays for this coverage.

columns.name: WAIVE_ON_ADMIT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the copay is waived on an ED admission for this coverage. "YES" indicates the copay will be waived. If null or "NO", the copay will not be waived on ED admittance.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: OUT_OF_PCKET_MET_YN

columns.name: FAMILY_TIER_C_NAME
columns.description:
Family tier for this line's coverage.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


N/A


Individual


Family

columns.name: MAX_VISITS
columns.description: The maximum number of visits for this coverage.

columns.name: REMAINING_VISITS
columns.description: The remaining number of visits for this coverage.

columns.name: LAST_IP_SNF_DATE
columns.description: This is the last date on which the patient received inpatient care or skilled nursing care. This is used in determining when a Medicare benefit period ends.

columns.name: NET_LVL_CVG_C_NAME
columns.description:
Network level for this line's coverage.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


In


Out


Out of Area


N/A

columns.name: CALC_NET_LVL_CVG_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the most recently calculated network level for this coverage.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NET_LVL_CVG_C_NAME

columns.name: CALC_NET_SRC_CVG_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the source of the most recently calculated network level for this coverage.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Selected


NET Definition


Plan Default


Payor Default


BEN Settings


System Default

columns.name: SEL_NET_LVL_CVG_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies which network level should be used for this encounter, at the coverage level.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NET_LVL_CVG_C_NAME

columns.name: PAYOR_ID
columns.description: This is the payor for these coverage-level benefits. This item is used when recording benefits before a coverage record has been created, such as for estimates for prospective patients.

columns.name: PAYOR_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: CVG_ANNUAL_BEN_USED_AMT
columns.description: The amount that has already been used for this coverage for a given year.

columns.name: RTE_COPAY_AMOUNT
columns.description: Stores the last copay value filed by RTE at the coverage level

columns.name: RTE_DEDUCT_AMOUNT
columns.description: Stores the last deductible amount filed by RTE at the coverage level

columns.name: RTE_DEDUCT_MET
columns.description: Stores the last deductible met amount filed by RTE at the coverage level

columns.name: RTE_DEDUCT_REMAIN
columns.description: Stores the last deductible remaining amount filed by RTE at the coverage level

columns.name: RTE_COINS_PERCENT
columns.description: Stores the last coinsurance percent filed by RTE at the coverage level

columns.name: RTE_OOP_MAX
columns.description: Stores the last OOP max amount filed by RTE at the coverage level

columns.name: RTE_OOP_REMAIN
columns.description: Stores the last OOP remaining amount filed by RTE at the coverage level

columns.name: POSTERIOR_COMPOSITE_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether or not posterior composite fillings are covered. 'Y' indicates that posterior composite fillings are covered. 'N' or NULL indicate that posterior composite fillings are not covered.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: OUT_OF_PCKET_MET_YN

columns.name: POSTERIOR_PORCELAIN_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether or not posterior porcelain crowns are covered. 'Y' indicates that posterior porcelain crowns are covered. 'N' or NULL indicate that posterior porcelain crowns are not covered.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: OUT_OF_PCKET_MET_YN

columns.name: CVG_BEN_BEGIN_DATE
columns.description: The coverage-level annual benefit period start date.

columns.name: VISIT_BEN_MAX_AMT
columns.description: The maximum visit benefits for this coverage.

columns.name: VISIT_OUT_OF_POCKET_MAX_AMT
columns.description: The coverage level maximum patient out-of-pocket for a visit.
